T02D2062:155b-1: bi sha la ne tra s'a dha nam /
T02D2062:155b-4: aom bi sha la ne tri sv'a h'a /
T02D2062:155b-5: zhes pa 'di chu klung gi 'gram du nyi ma
T02D2062:155b-6: re la khri phrag re re zla ba tsam bzlas
T02D2062:155b-7: la nya'i nub mo mtshan yal gyis bzlas pas tho
T02D2062:155b-8: rangs kyi dus su nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro
T02D2062:155b-9: // byung nas chung mar gyur nas nyi ma re la nor lnga lnga ster ro //
T02D2062:155b-10: 'di rnams kun rig pa mang po bzlas pa'i gang
T02D2062:155b-11: zag la nyi ma re res 'grub par 'gyur ro
